name: Zoda_Burb
content:
Zoda Burb was a Human businessman and con artist who lived on the planet Corellia during the Galactic Civil War. In 1 ABY, Zoda Burb encountered the Devaronian merchant Midgoss D'labaninaph who had just arrived on Corellia. The con artist swindled the Devaronian and abandoned him in the wilderness without any money. D'labaninaph therefore tried to win the favor of Brantlee Spondoon, the greedy assistant to the Corellian Diktat Daclif Gallamby, with a gift in order to have Zoda Burb punished. The attempt of the Devaronian was unfruitful but ironically inspired Burb who was more successful. The con artist offered a container of Neonan red cheese that extremely delighted Spondoon. The woman thus included the "businessman" in the government's contacts for future reference.
Zoda Burb was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
